00047 void SQLPROCESS_DLG_OP::OnProcess( wxCommandEvent &event )
00048 {
00049         // get the text to process.
00050         wxString myRequest = ((wxTextCtrl*) FindWindow(ID_TEXTCTRL))->GetValue();
00051         
00052         if (!myRequest.IsEmpty()) 
00053         {
00054                 wxLogMessage(_("Processing Request..."));
00055                 if (m_DataBase->DataBaseQuery(myRequest)==0)
00056                 {
00057                         ((wxStaticText *) FindWindow(ID_REQUEST_RESULT))->
00058                                 SetLabel(_("Results : OK Request passed."));
00059                 }
00060                 else 
00061                 {
00062                         ((wxStaticText *) FindWindow(ID_REQUEST_RESULT))->
00063                                 SetLabel(_("Results : Request Failed."));
00064                 }
00065         }
00066         
00067 }
00068 
00069 void SQLPROCESS_DLG_OP::OnCancel(wxCommandEvent &event)
00070 {
00071         this->Destroy();
00072     event.Skip();
00073 }
